summary: Completed testing of public landing page features and public project functionality. All public-facing features working correctly including project display, search, and navigation to public project pages with blog/library tabs.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests

ui_bugs.issue: Login form shows 'Signing in...' state but doesn't complete login process
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents testing of authenticated features like sorting preferences

passed_tests: Landing page loads and displays public projects section
Community Garden project appears on landing page
Search functionality works correctly (filters projects by 'garden' keyword)
Search shows 'No Projects Found' message for non-existent terms
Clicking public project navigates to /public/project/:id URL pattern
Public project page displays project information correctly
Public project page shows Public badge
Blog and Library tabs are present and functional
Empty state messages shown for blog and library tabs
Backend API endpoints for public projects all working
Public projects list API returns 3 projects including Community Garden
Public projects search API works correctly
Public project detail API returns correct project information
Public project blog and library APIs work (return empty arrays as expected)

success_percentage.backend: 95% (41/42 tests passed - minor auth response code issue)
success_percentage.frontend_authenticated: 0% (unable to test due to login issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix login form functionality - the form shows 'Signing in...' state but doesn't complete the login process, preventing testing of authenticated features like sorting preferences persistence. The useSortPreference hook implementation looks correct and should work once login is fixed.
